title: Can we lower the width on Brand's W?
body:
The most recent nerf really did nothing, adding 10 mana to W doesn't effectively change anything about how broken he is, he just does way too much damage with way too few items. 

I feel lowering the width of his W a bit would be a step in the right direction.  

When laning against a support Brand, unless you have tumble, blink, or maybe strut available, if he w's you with cursor on you, it's almost impossible to not get hit by it, and it does maybe 1/5 to 1/4 of your health pool with no real risk, as he's able to cast it from extremely far away. Adding the ability to escape this ability would make it a bit more balanced, since it is currently impossible if you aren't already moving, have a gap closer, or tier 2 boots. 

later in team fights, when he is able to engulf the entire team in one W and then ult, if he has 2-3 core items, it almost kills an entire team, for someone who points and clicks an ult that seems a bit out of control, yes there are counter measures, however, say there is a brand support with an annie, there's absolutely no counterplay at this point if she tibbers ults you, or amumu ult, wombo combo is a thing, however, oriana ult, yasuo ult, malphite ult, none of these do as much damage as brand with similar gold count

to make brand an actual fair champion to play against, you'd have to lower W width, lower ult damage slightly, and that would be about it. he would still be on par with other mid laners, just not disgustingly broken. I'd ideally like to see champions that are easy to play have more risk involved for their reward, leaving champions that require a lot of map awareness, technically, and mechanical skill to be as strong, if not stronger to reward you for putting in more effort. People say this is unfair all day, but don't complain about hyperscaling champions, even though it's the same thing, put in effort at the beginning to stay alive, win easier in the end.

hopefully this will be taken seriously and doesn't end up as another brand main downvoting fest.

It makes no sense to make that bug a standard part of his kit because a standard part of his kit is already dedicated to making his ult reliable. To make his ult "supposed" to prioritise champions regardless of his passive, they'd need a new passive interaction for his ult and then you've got a flat buff.

If the bug fix somehow makes him unplayable then they can easily buff him, but he shouldn't be strong because one of his abilities isn't functioning as intended. I know you're going to say "But Riven's animation cancelling!" but I don't think animation cancelling is comparable. Making an ability's cast time/animation shorter is one thing, making an ability have a function it's not supposed to is quite another.

Go into a custom game with a friend and see that Brand W isn't the full circumference that it shows. You can stand on the edge of it and not be hit. 

As for his ult killing an entire team. Really? If it bounces to the same target more than once then yea that person is dead. But one hit from it isnt that bad. If it is one bounce it is fairly low damage His scaling is shit but his high base damage is a big factor in why his early game is so strong, alone with his passive. It is his passive that really hurts.
If the enemy brand gets all of your teammates in a W then you deserve to loose that teamfight. He is an immobile skillshot oriented mage with no escapes that excels in teamfights. He is not too great at 1v1's as his ult can't bounce and get the most out of its damage. 

Learn to play around his strengths.
- He pushes waves once he has mana regen. Gank him.
- Deny him early  and he will have a hard time killing anyone. He is not necessarily feast or famine, but his three main items (ryalis, Liandrys and Void) are extremely expensive. He cant go through MR without void or liandrys.  
- He is hard countered by all in champs (and there are a lot of them that are strong right now)
- Dodge his highly animated skillshots
